name: js-angusj-clipper
description: Polygon and line clipping and offsetting library for Javascript / Typescript - a port of Angus Johnson's clipper to WebAssembly / Asm.JS

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.build:wasm: cd src/wasm && cmd /C compile.bat && cmd /C compile-wasm.bat && cd .. && cd .. && mkdirp dist/wasm && ncp src/wasm/clipper.js dist/wasm/clipper.js && ncp src/wasm/clipper-wasm.js dist/wasm/clipper-wasm.js && ncp src/wasm/clipper-wasm.wasm dist/wasm/clipper-wasm.wasm

author: Javier Gonzalez Garces <xaviergonz@gmail.com>
